pds.cdf
Class ADRecord

java.lang.Object
  pds.cdf.Record
      pds.cdf.ADRecord

public class ADRecord
extends Record

Attribute Descriptor Record (ADR). Contains a description of an attribute in a CDF. There will be one ADR per attribute. Defined in Section 2.4 of CDF specification.

Author:
tking

Constructor Summary

          Create a ADRecord based on a base record.

read

public long read(long offset,
                 DataInputStream in)
          throws IOException
Read the contents of a ADRecord from an input stream.
